features: The Real Techniques Miracle Complexion Sponge creates an even, natural glow to help dull, tired skin
Our #1 makeup blending sponge provides light to medium coverage
Use our makeup sponge with liquid and cream products such as foundations, skin tints, tinted moisturizers, and bb creams
The Miracle Complexion Sponge also works to blend liquid and cream blush, bronzer, and highlight for a seamless look
Use Real Technique’s MCS damp for best results
body.description: The Real Techniques Miracle Complexion Sponge flawlessly blends liquid and cream products with ease for a streak-free, luminous glow. Our #1 makeup blending sponge offers a natural, dewy finish, and its micro-fine pores help create a seamless base with light to medium coverage. Real Technique’s MCS works best with liquid and cream makeup products such as foundation, skin tints, and illuminators. This makeup sponge has RT's unique 3-point application technique that makes blending products seamless. First use the flat edge of the MCS to pack on product, then the precision tip to conceal, and finally, blend it all out with the rounded side. Use it damp for extra dewiness and let that inner glow shine through. The Miracle Complexion Sponge is easy to clean using our Real Techniques Brush + Sponge Cleansing Gel. It’s also 100% cruelty-free, vegan, and designed with revolutionary latex-free foam technology. We are Real Techniques, the brand of choice for all makeup users, no matter your level of expertise. Created in collaboration with leading makeup artists, we aspire to take the mystery out of choosing beauty tools so you can focus more time on putting your best face forward one blend at a time. From full makeup looks, to quick beauty hacks, RT brushes + sponges are exceptionally high quality for professional looking results every time. BUT… don’t be fooled by our affordable prices, RT tools are award-winning + purposefully designed because that’s what you deserve. Quality without compromise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes application easy and fast
reviews.reviewText: I've been using the real techniques miracle complexion sponges for years and so far they've been my favorite for applying liquid foundation. I get the sponge wet under running water and then squeeze out the excess water before using. This way the sponge doesn't absorb too much of my product and does well at applying and blending it on my face without much force or effort.Each sponge can last a while even with daily use if you take care of it and clean it. Allow it to dry between uses so as not to allow mold to grow.I've used sponges that feel more dense and harder to wash (including one of these once, so I'm not sure if it was just a random difference in manufacturing or somehow a different sponge), but usually these ones have a more airy feel to them and are easy to squeeze while washing.These sponges feel very gentle on the face, so much that even going back to a soft face brush feels more harsh than I'm used to. Another benefit of using these is that they don't leave any streaks that need further blending like brushes can and I feel are faster to dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best of the best!
reviews.reviewText: These are AMAZING! Wow! I ordered these bc of the price and WOW was I impressed! Love having so many on hand bc quite frankly I hate washing them daily and I don’t like reusing them once they’ve been used and they’re great for applying n foundation. I use slightly damp and they’re perfect! Foundation goes on so smooth and sleek! Price is great! You won’t be disappointed! I wash them with Cerave as that’s what my dermatologist said was the best thing to use and that works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than a beauty blender
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE these. I use Zote soap to clean them, and I can reuse them for a few weeks. Much more economical than a beauty blender.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've used the real technique sponge for over 5 years now! Have not found any other sponge with this quality!! Works great for foundation, concealer, contour! I highly recommend, especially for beginners!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Been using these for years
reviews.reviewText: I started using these years ago after hearing they were a good dupe for beauty blenders. I tried many others but none came close to these. Absolutely awesome for the price and work just as well as beauty blenders, which I used for a long time prior to trying these so I can definitely say they're just as good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Average Makeup Sponge
reviews.reviewText: I like to use these sponges for my concealer. They feel the same as the more expensive sponges out there. They haven't ripped are durable and do the job. I put them in my brush cleaning machine and they clean right up and come out in perfect condition.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these beauty blender!
reviews.reviewText: The price for this package is great! Cost much more if purchased in stores!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best sponge ever!
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this brand of sponge for 5 years. I always store some when there's a good discount

J’adore les éponges à maquillage de Real technique. Elles sont douces, denses mais pas trop dures. Elles n’absorbent pas trop de produit et sont durables. Elles sont un bon dupe du Beauty Blender et ce packaging est très avantageux.
Estas esponjas son lo mejor! Dejan un buen acabado y cuando las mojas se vuelven super suaves
Värdelöst. Paketet tillknycklat o tillplattat. Lär nog inte bli i första taget att jag beställer fr. Er. Ni har fortfarande mycket att lära Er. Jack.
Excelente produto!!Minha entrega chegou com menos de 5 dias , super ameiii .
